#begin_tag_1
#dinar
stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_algerian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_algerian_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_algerian_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_algerian_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_algerian_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_algerian_dinar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_algerian_dinar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
		}

	}
}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

		name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}

		}

			multiply = 4

			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {

				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_iraqi_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_iraqi_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {

		}
	}

				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency

						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes

							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}

						}
					}
				}
			}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1

				not = {

						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1

					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {

				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

			#export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0

				export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency

			}
		}

			add = export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
		}

			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
		}
	}
}

		}

stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {

	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}

		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {

		}

				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {

				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_libyan_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_libyan_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_libyan_dinar_stored = yes

		name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {

		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_libyan_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_libyan_dinar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_libyan_dinar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_moroccan_dirham
stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham = yes
	circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_moroccan_dirham = yes
	all_dinar_moroccan_dirham_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			add = import_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_moroccan_dirham_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_moroccan_dirham_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_omanian_rial
stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_omanian_rial = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_omanian_rial = yes
	circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_omanian_rial = yes
	all_dinar_omanian_rial_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0

					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0.05
			not  = {

			}

		change_variable = {

			add = export_in_dinar_omanian_rial
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_omanian_rial
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_omanian_rial
			add = import_in_dinar_omanian_rial
		}
	}
}

		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_omanian_rial_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_qiran
stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			add = dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_qiran = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_qiran = yes
	circulating_dinar_qiran_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_qiran = yes
	all_dinar_qiran_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_qiran_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			add = dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_qiran > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_qiran = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_qiran > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_qiran > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_qiran > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_qiran
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_qiran
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_qiran = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_qiran > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_qiran
			add = import_in_dinar_qiran
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_qiran_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_qiran_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_saudi_riyal
stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			add = dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_saudi_riyal = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal = yes
	circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_saudi_riyal = yes
	all_dinar_saudi_riyal_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			add = dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_saudi_riyal = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal
			add = import_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_saudi_riyal_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_saudi_riyal_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_serbian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_serbian_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_serbian_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_serbian_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_serbian_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes

	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}

				not = {

						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1

					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

				}
			}

			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_serbian_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
		}
	}
}

		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_serbian_dinar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
		}

	}

#dinar_tunisian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_tunisian_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_tunisian_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
		}
	}
}
all_dinar_tunisian_dinar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dinar_tunisian_dinar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar = yes
	reserve_currency_dinar_yugoslav_dinar = yes
	circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dinar_yugoslav_dinar = yes
	all_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency

			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar

					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
			add = import_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
		}
	}

#dollar_australian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_australian_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_australian_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_australian_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_australian_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dollar_australian_dollar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dollar_australian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dollar_australian_dollar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dollar_australian_dollar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dollar_australian_dollar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dollar_australian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_australian_dollar
			add = import_in_dollar_australian_dollar
		}
	}
}
all_dollar_australian_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_australian_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dollar_canadian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_canadian_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_canadian_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_canadian_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dollar_canadian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar
			add = import_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
		}
	}
}
all_dollar_canadian_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_canadian_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dollar_caribbean_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_caribbean_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_caribbean_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_caribbean_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target

				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
