#dollar_confederate_states_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_confederate_states_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_confederate_states_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {

		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_state_1 = yes

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency

					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes

					or = {

						is_in_revaluation = yes

							limit = {

			}
		}
		if = {

				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {

				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0

		}

all_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dollar_liberian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_liberian_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_liberian_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_liberian_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dollar_liberian_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar
			add = import_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
		}
	}
}
all_dollar_liberian_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_liberian_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2

		}

			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	reset_import_export_dollar_new_zealand_dollar = yes

stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

		name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {

			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_stored = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

				market.owner = root

						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
			add = import_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
		}
	}
}
all_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#dollar_united_states_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_dollar_united_states_dollar = yes
	reserve_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar = yes
	circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_dollar_united_states_dollar = yes
	all_dollar_united_states_dollar_stored = yes
}
circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_dollar_united_states_dollar = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar
			add = import_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
		}
	}
}
all_dollar_united_states_dollar_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_dollar_united_states_dollar_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
		}

	}
}
#eco_ariary
stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			add = eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_ariary = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_ariary = yes
	circulating_eco_ariary_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_ariary = yes
	all_eco_ariary_stored = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			add = eco_ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_state_1 = yes

			limit = {

					money_supply < money_value_target

				}
				market.owner = root

					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}

						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1

				}
			}
		}

				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = {

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_ariary > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}

			not  = {

			}
		}

					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_ariary
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_ariary > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ariary
			add = import_in_eco_ariary
		}
	}
}

			name = all_eco_ariary_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_ariary_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
		}

	}
}
#eco_central_african_eco
stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_central_african_eco = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_central_african_eco = yes
	circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_central_african_eco = yes
	all_eco_central_african_eco_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_central_african_eco > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_central_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_central_african_eco > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_central_african_eco > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_central_african_eco > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_central_african_eco
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_central_african_eco
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_central_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_central_african_eco > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_central_african_eco
			add = import_in_eco_central_african_eco
		}
	}
}
all_eco_central_african_eco_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_central_african_eco_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
		}

	}
}
#eco_east_african_eco
stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_east_african_eco = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_east_african_eco = yes
	circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_east_african_eco = yes
	all_eco_east_african_eco_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_east_african_eco > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_east_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_east_african_eco > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_east_african_eco
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_east_african_eco
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_east_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_east_african_eco
			add = import_in_eco_east_african_eco
		}
	}
}
all_eco_east_african_eco_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_east_african_eco_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add = eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_ethiopian_birr = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_ethiopian_birr = yes
	circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_ethiopian_birr = yes
	all_eco_ethiopian_birr_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2

		}

		}

			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency

					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}

				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {

				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}

						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1

					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}

		limit = {
			import_in_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ethiopian_birr

#eco_ghanaian_pound
stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_ghanaian_pound = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound = yes
	circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_ghanaian_pound = yes
	all_eco_ghanaian_pound_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_ghanaian_pound = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound
			add = import_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
		}
	}
}
all_eco_ghanaian_pound_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_ghanaian_pound_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
		}

	}
}
#eco_nigerian_naira
stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add = eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_nigerian_naira = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_nigerian_naira = yes
	circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_nigerian_naira = yes
	all_eco_nigerian_naira_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add = eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_nigerian_naira > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_nigerian_naira = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_nigerian_naira > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_nigerian_naira
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_nigerian_naira
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_nigerian_naira = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_nigerian_naira
			add = import_in_eco_nigerian_naira
		}
	}
}
all_eco_nigerian_naira_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_nigerian_naira_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
		}

	}

#eco_south_african_rand
stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_south_african_rand = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_south_african_rand = yes
	circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_south_african_rand = yes
	all_eco_south_african_rand_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_south_african_rand > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_south_african_rand = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_south_african_rand > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_south_african_rand
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_south_african_rand
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_south_african_rand = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_south_african_rand
			add = import_in_eco_south_african_rand
		}
	}
}
all_eco_south_african_rand_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_south_african_rand_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
		}

	}

#eco_tuareg_ouguiya
stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = yes
	circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = yes
	all_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
			add = import_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
		}
	}
}
all_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
		}

	}
}
#eco_west_african_eco
stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_eco_west_african_eco = yes
	reserve_currency_eco_west_african_eco = yes
	circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_eco_west_african_eco = yes
	all_eco_west_african_eco_stored = yes
}
circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_eco_west_african_eco > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_eco_west_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_eco_west_african_eco > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_eco_west_african_eco
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_eco_west_african_eco
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_eco_west_african_eco = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_west_african_eco
			add = import_in_eco_west_african_eco
		}
	}
}
all_eco_west_african_eco_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_eco_west_african_eco_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
		}

	}
