#franc_belgian_franc
stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_franc_belgian_franc = yes
	reserve_currency_franc_belgian_franc = yes
	circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_franc_belgian_franc = yes
	all_franc_belgian_franc_stored = yes
}
circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_franc_belgian_franc > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0

					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_franc_belgian_franc > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_franc_belgian_franc
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_franc_belgian_franc
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_franc_belgian_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc
			add = import_in_franc_belgian_franc
		}
	}
}
all_franc_belgian_franc_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_franc_belgian_franc_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
		}

	}
}
#franc_french_franc
stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_franc_french_franc = yes
	reserve_currency_franc_french_franc = yes
	circulating_franc_french_franc_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_franc_french_franc = yes
	all_franc_french_franc_stored = yes
}
circulating_franc_french_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_franc_french_franc > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		# if = {
		# 	limit = {
		# 		has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
		# 		market.owner = root
		# 		not = {
		# 			or = {
		# 				money_supply < money_value_target
		# 				is_in_devaluation = yes
		# 			}
		# 		}
		# 		# not  = {
		# 		# 	or = {
		# 		# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
		# 		# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
		# 		# 		if = {
		# 		# 			limit = {
		# 		# 				is_in_devaluation = no
		# 		# 			}
		# 		# 			money_supply > money_value_target
		# 		# 		}
		# 		# 	}
		# 		# }
		# 	}
		# 	set_variable = {
		# 		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		# 		value = 0
		# 	}
		# }
	}
}
reserve_currency_franc_french_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_franc_french_franc > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_franc_french_franc > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_franc_french_franc > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_franc_french_franc
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_franc_french_franc
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_franc_french_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_franc_french_franc > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_french_franc
			add = import_in_franc_french_franc
		}
	}
}
all_franc_french_franc_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_franc_french_franc_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
		}

	}
}
#franc_luxembourgish_franc
stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc = yes
	reserve_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc = yes
	circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_franc_luxembourgish_franc = yes
	all_franc_luxembourgish_franc_stored = yes
}
circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {

		}

		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc
			add = import_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
		}
	}

#franc_swiss_franc
stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_franc_swiss_franc = yes
	reserve_currency_franc_swiss_franc = yes
	circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_franc_swiss_franc = yes
	all_franc_swiss_franc_stored = yes
}
circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}

stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_franc_swiss_franc > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_franc_swiss_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_franc_swiss_franc > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_franc_swiss_franc
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_franc_swiss_franc
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_franc_swiss_franc = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_swiss_franc
			add = import_in_franc_swiss_franc
		}
	}
}
all_franc_swiss_franc_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_franc_swiss_franc_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
		}

	}
}
#gulden
stockpiling_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden = yes
	circulating_gulden_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden = yes
	all_gulden_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_gulden > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_gulden = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_gulden > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_gulden > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_gulden > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_gulden
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_gulden
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_gulden = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_gulden > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden
			add = import_in_gulden
		}
	}
}
all_gulden_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_gulden_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_state_1
		}

	}
}
#gulden_bavarian_gulden
stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden_bavarian_gulden = yes
	circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden_bavarian_gulden = yes
	all_gulden_bavarian_gulden_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes

			}

				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		}

#gulden_florin
stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden_florin = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden_florin = yes
	circulating_gulden_florin_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden_florin = yes
	all_gulden_florin_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_florin_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_gulden_florin > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_gulden_florin = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_gulden_florin > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_gulden_florin > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_gulden_florin > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_gulden_florin
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_gulden_florin
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_gulden_florin = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_gulden_florin > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_florin
			add = import_in_gulden_florin
		}
	}
}
all_gulden_florin_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_gulden_florin_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
		}

	}
}
#gulden_hungarian_forint
stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden_hungarian_forint = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint = yes
	circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden_hungarian_forint = yes
	all_gulden_hungarian_forint_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_gulden_hungarian_forint = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint
			add = import_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
		}
	}
}
all_gulden_hungarian_forint_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_gulden_hungarian_forint_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			add = gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden_indies_guilder = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden_indies_guilder = yes
	circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden_indies_guilder = yes
	all_gulden_indies_guilder_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {

		}
	}

	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_gulden_indies_guilder > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_gulden_indies_guilder
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = {

		}

#gulden_south_german_gulden
stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_gulden_south_german_gulden = yes
	reserve_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden = yes
	circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_gulden_south_german_gulden = yes
	all_gulden_south_german_gulden_stored = yes
}
circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_gulden_south_german_gulden = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden
			add = import_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
		}
	}
}
all_gulden_south_german_gulden_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_gulden_south_german_gulden_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
		}

	}
}
#krone_czech_koruna
stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			add = krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_krone_czech_koruna = yes
	reserve_currency_krone_czech_koruna = yes
	circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_krone_czech_koruna = yes
	all_krone_czech_koruna_stored = yes
}
circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			add = krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_krone_czech_koruna = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_krone_czech_koruna > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_krone_czech_koruna > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_krone_czech_koruna
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_krone_czech_koruna
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_krone_czech_koruna = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_krone_czech_koruna > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_czech_koruna
			add = import_in_krone_czech_koruna
		}
	}
}
all_krone_czech_koruna_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_krone_czech_koruna_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_krone_danish_krone = yes
	reserve_currency_krone_danish_krone = yes
	circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_krone_danish_krone = yes
	all_krone_danish_krone_stored = yes
}
circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}

				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency

							limit = {

							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}

			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1

				}
			}
		}

				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

			add = export_in_krone_danish_krone

			if = {

					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_krone_danish_krone
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = {
			import_in_krone_danish_krone > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_danish_krone
			add = import_in_krone_danish_krone
		}
