#lira_scudo_sardo
stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_lira_scudo_sardo = yes
	reserve_currency_lira_scudo_sardo = yes
	circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_lira_scudo_sardo = yes
	all_lira_scudo_sardo_stored = yes
}
circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_lira_scudo_sardo > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_lira_scudo_sardo = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_lira_scudo_sardo > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_lira_scudo_sardo
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_lira_scudo_sardo
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_lira_scudo_sardo = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_scudo_sardo
			add = import_in_lira_scudo_sardo
		}
	}
}
all_lira_scudo_sardo_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_lira_scudo_sardo_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
		}

	}
}
#lira_toscane_lira
stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_lira_toscane_lira = yes
	reserve_currency_lira_toscane_lira = yes
	circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_lira_toscane_lira = yes
	all_lira_toscane_lira_stored = yes
}
circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_lira_toscane_lira > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_lira_toscane_lira = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_lira_toscane_lira > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_lira_toscane_lira
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_lira_toscane_lira
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_lira_toscane_lira = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_toscane_lira
			add = import_in_lira_toscane_lira
		}
	}
}
all_lira_toscane_lira_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_lira_toscane_lira_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
		}

	}
}
#mark
stockpiling_mark_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mark_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mark_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_mark = yes
	reserve_currency_mark = yes
	circulating_mark_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_mark = yes
	all_mark_stored = yes
}
circulating_mark_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_mark > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_mark = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_mark > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_mark > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_mark > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_mark
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_mark
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_mark = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_mark > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_mark
			add = import_in_mark
		}
	}
}
all_mark_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_mark_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_mark_state  #var:stockpiling_mark_state_1
		}

	}
}
#mark_finnish_markka
stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_mark_finnish_markka = yes
	reserve_currency_mark_finnish_markka = yes
	circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_mark_finnish_markka = yes
	all_mark_finnish_markka_stored = yes
}
circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_mark_finnish_markka > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_mark_finnish_markka = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_mark_finnish_markka > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_mark_finnish_markka
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_mark_finnish_markka
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_mark_finnish_markka = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_mark_finnish_markka
			add = import_in_mark_finnish_markka
		}
	}
}
all_mark_finnish_markka_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_mark_finnish_markka_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state  #var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso
stockpiling_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso = yes
	all_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso
			add = import_in_peso
		}
	}
}
all_peso_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_peso_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso_argentine_peso
stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_argentine_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_argentine_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_argentine_peso = yes
	all_peso_argentine_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_argentine_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_argentine_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency

		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {

					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_argentine_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_argentine_peso
			add = import_in_peso_argentine_peso
		}
	}

			name = all_peso_argentine_peso_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso_bolivien_peso
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_bolivien_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_bolivien_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_bolivien_peso = yes
	all_peso_bolivien_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_bolivien_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_peso_bolivien_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_bolivien_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_bolivien_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_bolivien_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso_bolivien_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_bolivien_peso
			add = import_in_peso_bolivien_peso
		}
	}
}
all_peso_bolivien_peso_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_peso_bolivien_peso_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso_chilean_peso
stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_chilean_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_chilean_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_chilean_peso = yes
	all_peso_chilean_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_chilean_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_peso_chilean_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_chilean_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_chilean_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_chilean_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso_chilean_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso
			add = import_in_peso_chilean_peso
		}
	}
}
all_peso_chilean_peso_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_peso_chilean_peso_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_colombian_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_colombian_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_colombian_peso = yes
	all_peso_colombian_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}

		}

			add = var:circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_colombian_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency

			}

		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_colombian_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_colombian_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_colombian_peso
			add = import_in_peso_colombian_peso

#peso_costa_rican_colon
stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			add = peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_costa_rican_colon = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon = yes
	circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_costa_rican_colon = yes
	all_peso_costa_rican_colon_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			add = peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso_costa_rican_colon = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon
			add = import_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
		}
	}
}
all_peso_costa_rican_colon_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_peso_costa_rican_colon_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso_cuban_peso
stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_cuban_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_cuban_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_cuban_peso = yes
	all_peso_cuban_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_cuban_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_peso_cuban_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_cuban_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_cuban_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_cuban_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso_cuban_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_cuban_peso
			add = import_in_peso_cuban_peso
		}
	}
}
all_peso_cuban_peso_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_peso_cuban_peso_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
		}

	}
}
#peso_ecuadorian_peso
stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso = yes
	reserve_currency_peso_ecuadorian_peso = yes
	circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_peso_ecuadorian_peso = yes
	all_peso_ecuadorian_peso_stored = yes
}
circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_ecuadorian_peso
			add = import_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
		}
	}
}
