		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_pound_irish_pound = yes
	reserve_currency_pound_irish_pound = yes
	circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_pound_irish_pound = yes
	all_pound_irish_pound_stored = yes
}
circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_pound_irish_pound > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_pound_irish_pound = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_pound_irish_pound > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_pound_irish_pound > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_pound_irish_pound
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_pound_irish_pound
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_pound_irish_pound = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_pound_irish_pound
			add = import_in_pound_irish_pound
		}
	}
}
all_pound_irish_pound_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_pound_irish_pound_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state  #var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
		}

	}
}
#pound_sterling
stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_pound_sterling = yes
	reserve_currency_pound_sterling = yes
	circulating_pound_sterling_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_pound_sterling = yes
	all_pound_sterling_stored = yes
}
circulating_pound_sterling_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_pound_sterling > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_pound_sterling = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_pound_sterling > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_pound_sterling > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_pound_sterling > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_pound_sterling
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_pound_sterling
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_pound_sterling = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_pound_sterling > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_pound_sterling
			add = import_in_pound_sterling
		}
	}
}
all_pound_sterling_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_pound_sterling_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_pound_sterling_state  #var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
		}

	}
}
#real
stockpiling_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_real_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_real = yes
	reserve_currency_real = yes
	circulating_real_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_real = yes
	all_real_stored = yes
}
circulating_real_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_real > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_real = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_real > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_real > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_real > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_real
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_real
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_real = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_real > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_real
			add = import_in_real
		}
	}
}
all_real_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_real_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_real_state  #var:stockpiling_real_state_1
		}

	}
}
#real_brazilian_real
stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add = real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_real_brazilian_real = yes
	reserve_currency_real_brazilian_real = yes
	circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_real_brazilian_real = yes
	all_real_brazilian_real_stored = yes
}
circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add = real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_real_brazilian_real > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_real_brazilian_real = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_real_brazilian_real > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_real_brazilian_real > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_real_brazilian_real > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_real_brazilian_real
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_real_brazilian_real
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_real_brazilian_real = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_real_brazilian_real > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_real_brazilian_real
			add = import_in_real_brazilian_real
		}
	}
}
all_real_brazilian_real_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_real_brazilian_real_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state  #var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
		}

	}
}
#rupee_indian_rupee
stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_rupee_indian_rupee = yes
	reserve_currency_rupee_indian_rupee = yes
	circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_rupee_indian_rupee = yes
	all_rupee_indian_rupee_stored = yes
}
circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_rupee_indian_rupee = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_rupee_indian_rupee > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_rupee_indian_rupee
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_rupee_indian_rupee
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_rupee_indian_rupee = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_rupee_indian_rupee
			add = import_in_rupee_indian_rupee
		}
	}
}
all_rupee_indian_rupee_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_rupee_indian_rupee_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state  #var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
		}

	}
}
#rupee_indonesian_rupiah
stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah = yes
	reserve_currency_rupee_indonesian_rupiah = yes
	circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_rupee_indonesian_rupiah = yes
	all_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_stored = yes
}
circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_rupee_indonesian_rupiah = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
			add = import_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
		}
	}
}

	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state  #var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
		}

	}
}
#spe_baht
stockpiling_spe_baht_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_baht_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_baht_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
			add = spe_baht_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_baht = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_baht = yes
	circulating_spe_baht_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_baht = yes
	all_spe_baht_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_baht_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_baht_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
			add = spe_baht_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_baht_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_baht_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_baht > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_baht = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_baht > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_baht > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_baht > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_baht
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_baht
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_baht = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_baht > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_baht
			add = import_in_spe_baht
		}
	}
}
all_spe_baht_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_baht_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_baht_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
		}

	}
}
#spe_dong
stockpiling_spe_dong_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_dong_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_dong_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
			add = spe_dong_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_dong = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_dong = yes
	circulating_spe_dong_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_dong = yes
	all_spe_dong_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_dong_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
			add = spe_dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_dong_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_dong_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_dong > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_dong = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_dong > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_dong > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_dong > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_dong
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_dong
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_dong = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_dong > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_dong
			add = import_in_spe_dong
		}
	}
}
all_spe_dong_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_dong_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_dong_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
		}

	}
}
#spe_drachma
stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_drachma_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			add = spe_drachma_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_drachma = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_drachma = yes
	circulating_spe_drachma_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_drachma = yes
	all_spe_drachma_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_drachma_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_drachma_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			add = spe_drachma_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_drachma > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_drachma = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_drachma > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_drachma > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_drachma > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_drachma
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_drachma
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_drachma = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_drachma > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_drachma
			add = import_in_spe_drachma
		}
	}
}

	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_drachma_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_drachma_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
		}

	}
}
#spe_korean_won
stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_korean_won_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			add = spe_korean_won_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_korean_won = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_korean_won = yes
	circulating_spe_korean_won_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_korean_won = yes
	all_spe_korean_won_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_korean_won_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_korean_won_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			add = spe_korean_won_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_korean_won > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_korean_won = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_korean_won > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_korean_won > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_korean_won > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_korean_won
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_korean_won
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_korean_won = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_korean_won > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_korean_won
			add = import_in_spe_korean_won
		}
	}
}
all_spe_korean_won_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_korean_won_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
		}

	}
}
#spe_latvian_lats
stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			add = spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_latvian_lats = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_latvian_lats = yes
	circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_latvian_lats = yes
	all_spe_latvian_lats_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			add = spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_latvian_lats > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_latvian_lats = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_latvian_lats > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_latvian_lats > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_latvian_lats > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_latvian_lats
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_latvian_lats
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_latvian_lats = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_latvian_lats > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_latvian_lats
			add = import_in_spe_latvian_lats
		}
	}
}
all_spe_latvian_lats_stored = {
	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_latvian_lats_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
		}

	}
}

stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
	    subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
	}
	#######################################################################
	#scope
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			add = spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		}
	}

	debt_in_spe_lithuanian_litas = yes
	reserve_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas = yes
	circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = yes
	reset_import_export_spe_lithuanian_litas = yes
	all_spe_lithuanian_litas_stored = yes
}
circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			add = spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
				}
				not = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
				#money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0.05 #ne représente rien donc pas save performance
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				if = {
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
				market.owner = root
				not = {
					or = {
						money_supply < money_value_target
						is_in_devaluation = yes
					}
				}
				# not  = {
				# 	or = {
				# 		is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				# 		is_in_revaluation = yes
				# 		if = {
				# 			limit = {
				# 				is_in_devaluation = no
				# 			}
				# 			money_supply > money_value_target
				# 		}
				# 	}
				# }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
reserve_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			#export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0

			or  = {
				export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
				not  = {
					scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
			#money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0.05
			not  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}
		}
		#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
			add = export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			if = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
				}
			}
		}
		#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			add  = {
				add = export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
				divide = 4
			}
		}
	}
}
debt_in_spe_lithuanian_litas = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
			#has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas
			add = import_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
		}

	scope:central_bank_site = {
		set_variable = {
			name = all_spe_lithuanian_litas_stored
			value = owner.stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
		}
