					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_libyan_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_libyan_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_moroccan_dirham
buy_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var

			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_moroccan_dirham_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit

					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_omanian_rial
buy_dinar_omanian_rial_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_omanian_rial_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_omanian_rial_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_qiran
buy_dinar_qiran_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_qiran_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_qiran_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_qiran_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_qiran_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_saudi_riyal
buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_serbian_dinar
buy_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_tunisian_dinar
buy_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
buy_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}

		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {

				sell_currency_1 = yes

		}

				name = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {

			# }

						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
