					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#eco_west_african_eco
buy_eco_west_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_west_african_eco_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_west_african_eco_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#franc_belgian_franc
buy_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_belgian_franc_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var

			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#franc_french_franc
buy_franc_french_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_french_franc_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_french_franc_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#franc_luxembourgish_franc
buy_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#franc_swiss_franc
buy_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_swiss_franc_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#gulden
buy_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:gulden_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_gulden_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#gulden_bavarian_gulden
buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#gulden_florin
buy_gulden_florin_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_florin_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_florin_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_florin_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_florin_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_florin_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = gulden_florin_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:gulden_florin_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#gulden_hungarian_forint
buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_hungarian_forint_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
