					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#mark
buy_mark_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = mark_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = mark_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:mark_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mark_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_mark_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = mark_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = mark_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_mark_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:mark_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:mark_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = mark_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_mark_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:mark_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:mark_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#mark_finnish_markka
buy_mark_finnish_markka_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = mark_finnish_markka_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_mark_finnish_markka_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_finnish_markka_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = mark_finnish_markka_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_finnish_markka_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:mark_finnish_markka_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso
buy_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_argentine_peso
buy_peso_argentine_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_argentine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_argentine_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_argentine_peso_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_argentine_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_argentine_peso_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_argentine_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_bolivien_peso
buy_peso_bolivien_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_bolivien_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_bolivien_peso_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_bolivien_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_bolivien_peso_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_bolivien_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_chilean_peso
buy_peso_chilean_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_chilean_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_chilean_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_chilean_peso_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_chilean_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_chilean_peso_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_chilean_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_colombian_peso
buy_peso_colombian_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_colombian_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_colombian_peso_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_colombian_peso_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_colombian_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_colombian_peso_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_colombian_peso_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_costa_rican_colon
buy_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_costa_rican_colon_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					}

					scope:central_bank_site = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_costa_rican_colon_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:peso_costa_rican_colon_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state

						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}
#peso_cuban_peso
buy_peso_cuban_peso_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = peso_cuban_peso_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#reset_purchase_cycle
	set_variable = {
		name = purchase_cycle
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				buy_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = peso_cuban_peso_quantity_var
					value = { 1000000 10000000 }
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
					value = var:peso_cuban_peso_quantity_var
				}
