						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = purchase_cycle
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency = {

	#scope:
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				multiply = 0.5
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	every_country = {
		limit  = {
			is_player = yes
		}
		save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
		}
		scope:is_player_for_notification = {
			post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_crisis = {

	#scope:
	scope:seller = {
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
	}
	scope:target_country = {
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
			}
		}
	}

	#root:
	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
				sell_currency_1 = yes
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			set_variable = { #garder pour notif
				name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
				value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
			}
			# change_variable = {
			# 	name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
			# 	multiply = 0.1
			# }

			set_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
				value = {
					value = 1
					add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
							scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						}
						sell_currency_2 = yes
					}
				}

				scope:central_bank_site = {
					#GOLD
					change_variable = {
						name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
						add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
					}
					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 < 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							add = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
					value = scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
				}

				#central_bank_site_seller
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_gold
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#notification
	scope:target_country = {
		post_notification = unstable_currency_message
	}
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

# reset_debt_in_national_currency

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

reset_debt_in_national_currency = {
	#dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_libyan_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar

			}

			var:debt_in_national_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso
			subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

# ███╗   ███╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗ █████╗ ███╗   ██╗         ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║██╔══██╗████╗  ██║        ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║█████╗  ██║  ██║██║███████║██╔██╗ ██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══╝  ██║  ██║██║██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████╗██████╔╝██║██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝
#
# ██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
#  ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
#   ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
#    ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
#    ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

# 	set_global_variable = {

	# # Initialisation de la valeur la plus élevée
	# set_variable = {

	# 	value = 0

	# # set_global_variable = {

	# # 	value = 0.0

	# # Vérification de chaque valeur et mise à jour si nécessaire
	# if = {

	# if = {

	# 	set_global_variable = {
	# 		name = money_value_median

	# }
	# if = {
	# 	limit = { median_currency_value_3 > var:highest_median_currency_value }
	# 	set_variable = {
	# 		name = highest_median_currency_value
	# 		value = median_currency_value_3
	# 	}
	# 	set_global_variable = {
	# 		name = money_value_median

	# 	}

	# if = {
	# 	limit = { median_currency_value_4 > var:highest_median_currency_value }
	# 	set_variable = {
	# 		name = highest_median_currency_value
	# 		value = median_currency_value_4
	# 	}
	# 	set_global_variable = {
	# 		name = money_value_median
	# 		value = 1.00

#  ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██████╗     ███████╗ ██████╗ ████████╗     █████╗ ██╗     ██╗
# ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗    ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██║     ██║
# ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║         ██║   ██║███████║██████╔╝    █████╗  ██║   ██║   ██║       ███████║██║     ██║
# ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║         ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██╔══██╗    ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║   ██║       ██╔══██║██║     ██║
# ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗     ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║██║  ██║    ██║     ╚██████╔╝   ██║       ██║  ██║███████╗███████╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝      ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝    ╚═╝      ╚═════╝    ╚═╝       ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝
#
#  ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

#begin_tag_5
#dinar
money_value_dinar_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_dinar_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = dinar_leading_currency_type
				}
				add = money_value_target_real #money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = dinar_iraqi_dinar_leading_currency_type
					#not = {
					#	has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
					#}

		}
	}

money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar_global_var = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar_global_var
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = dollar_caribbean_dollar_leading_currency_type
					#not = {
					#	has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
					#}
				}
				add = money_value_target_real #money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = peso_bolivien_peso_leading_currency_type
					#not = {
					#	has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
					#}
				}
				add = money_value_target_real #money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗     ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     █████╗      ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     ██╔══╝      ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║  ██║███████╗██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗███████╗    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝
#
# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║        ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝         ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

global_monetary_reference_1 = {
	#dinar
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar

			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_peso_paraguayan_peso
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#peso_philippine_peso
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency

	#peso_sol_de_oro

	global_monetary_reference_2 = yes
}
global_monetary_reference_2 = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = global_monetary_reference_money_value
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
				}
				add = money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

# #  ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗         ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗        ██╗██████╗
# # ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝       ███║██╔══██╗
# # ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗       ╚██║██████╔╝
# # ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║        ██║██╔══██╗
# # ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║███████╗██║██████╔╝
# #  ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═════╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

investement_pool_borrowing = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_ai = yes
		}

		#more economic_instability - 10%
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = economic_instability
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.1
			}
		}

		#more 75% - 10%
		if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.75
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.1
			}
		}
		#more 50% - 8%
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.75
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.5
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.08
			}
		}
		#more 50% - 6%
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.50
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.25
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.06
			}
		}
		#b
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.25
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.20
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.20
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.15
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.04
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.15
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.10
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.03
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.10
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.05
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.02
			}

		}

		#at 1 year
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.05
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.05
			}
			# #transfer direct
			# set_variable = {
			# 	name = direct_transfer
			# 	value = money_supply_state_25
			# }
			add_investment_pool = {
				add = {
					add = money_supply
					multiply = 0.20
				}
			}
		}
	}

	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
	}
	# if = {
	# 	limit = {
	# 		money_supply_state > private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar
	# 	if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_libyan_dinar
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_moroccan_dirham
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_omanian_rial
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_qiran
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_saudi_riyal
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#dinar_serbian_dinar
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

		add = private_bank_borrowings_year
	}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#Bc production methode

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

central_bank_production_methods = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#-> pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_production_method_active = {  #si currency standart alors enlve la nécessité de l'or 
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
				}
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_gold_consuption
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		# -> pm_gold_exchange_standard_bank_money_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_production_method_active = {  #si GES alors enlve la nécessité de l'or 
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_gold_exchange_standard_bank_money_currency
				}
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_gold_consuption
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}
	}
}

central_bank_production_methods_2 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
					}

				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_franc_swiss_franc_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}

				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#spe_peseta
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_peseta_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_peseta_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#spe_ruble
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_ruble_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_ruble_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#spe_uni
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
						}
						market.owner = {

						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {

						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_uni_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank

			}
			activate_production_method = {

central_bank_production_methods_3 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#pound_sterling
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_pound_sterling_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
	}
}

#Bc production methode

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

remove_law_currency = {
	activate_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
}

regulation_law_gold_standard = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_standard
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_technology_researched = currency_standards
			or = {
				has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
				not = {
					or = {
						has_technology_researched = gold_standard
						has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_currency_standard
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_technology_researched = gold_standard
			not = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
				}
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
	}
	# if = {
	# 	limit = {
	# 		has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
	# 		not = {
	# 			or = {
	# 				has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
	# 				has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	activate_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
	# }
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

currency_of_player = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {

			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
		}

		}

	set_global_variable = {
		name = currency_of_player_is_thaler_prussian_thaler
		value = 0
	}
	set_global_variable = {
		name = currency_of_player_is_thaler_saxon_thaler
		value = 0
	}
}
